topic: Radiance-Users (UK) Course 2004: Notice for Expressions of Interest

Radiance-Users (UK) Course 2004: Notice for Expressions of Interest 


Following on from the success of the 2003 course, the IESD are
planning to host another in 2004 (around September). Intended 
for researchers and practitioners, it will be led by Dr. John 
Mardaljevic (author of the Daylight Simulation chapter of the 
Radiance book) and take place in the Queens Building, De Montfort 
University, Leicester, UK. The course will focus on how Radiance 
is used to solve real-world lighting problems. There will be an 
emphasis on daylight modelling and controlling the ambient calculation.


Course viability will depend on sufficient numbers. To register 
an interest in attending, send e-mail to John Mardaljevic. 
Please give name, affiliation and contact details for each person.


Regards,


-John Mardaljevic
